A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a new experience of Star Wars\, which is dedicated to youth\, who sees the film as a modern version of great stories\, a great CGI animation\, as well as new and old characters of the saga\, which grow transcendentally. Although\, for an old fan\, it seems insufficient\, with plot holes and expectant villains\, like Snoke\, who fall; It is true in some points\, but in the end the film is surprising and creative.
